attributes.action: Have a National Screening Programme for Ovarian Cancer for all Women Over 40
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ovarian Cancer is a killer a silent killer as the symptoms often go un recognised until it is too late for a good survival prognosis, currently only about 28% of all cases diagnosed will be survived for five years or more and that statistic is just far too low.
